source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Elite Card Technique
items.headline: Beginners Card Magic
objectives_summary: hold cards in mechanics grip
riffle shuffle
hindu shuffle

items.title: URBAN sketching. Drawing & painting fast & fun. PART 1

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Fun course to introduce anyone to an 'urban sketching' style of drawing & colouring on the go. FAST and FUN, simple tips
objectives_summary: Learn to look at subjects in blocks and simple shapes.
No longer get overwhelmed by the details.
All your artwork will benefit from trying this different approach.

items.title: Watercolor Fast and Loose! Express yourself in your painting
items.headline: Learn how to paint with freedom using the methods of seven masters of impressionist watercolor painting
objectives_summary: paint in a loose and expressive style

items.title: How to Loosen Up Your Painting
items.headline: Learn to Paint in a Loose Style with Oils or Acrylics
objectives_summary: Use brushwork skills to paint in a loose, impressionist style.
Assess a subject for suitable composition and potential for a strong painting.
Master color mixing.

items.title: Loose Watercolor Painting "Sailing Boat Low Tide"
items.headline: Join me and explore the possibilities of loose watercolour painting.  Take the stress out of painting and relax .
objectives_summary: know how to plan your painting before you start
learn to capture clouds with simple brush strokes more confidently
You will understand how to mix colour simply and effectively

items.title: Brother ScanNCut Advanced
items.headline: Professional Crafting Techniques with the Brother Scan and Cut
objectives_summary: You will be able to use the built in patterns to create and edit shapes to use for crafting projects.
You will be able to scan patterned paper and cut out selected areas.
You will be able to select and use the appropriate settings when cutting out patterns and stamped images.

items.title: Watercolours With Confidence!

visible_instructors.name: Wendy
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist, illustrator, and watercolour lover
visible_instructors.title: Wendy Framst

items.headline: Learn step by step how to paint beautiful watercolour artwork with confidence. Comprehensive course for beginners & up!
objectives_summary: Painting with watercolors is easier than commonly believed
You will gain confidence with watercolours through step by step instruction
You will have fun exploring how to apply paint to the paper in many creative ways, with many different brush types and other materials as well

items.title: Natural Soap Bars From Scratch For Beginners
items.headline: Beginner  |  Cold-Process Method  |  Vegan Recipes  |  Natural Ingredients
objectives_summary: Learn how to make natural soap bars from scratch using the Cold-Process (CP) method.
Understand the safety associated with soap-making and know what precautions to take when making homemade soap.
Learn to formulate your own soap recipes with the ingredients that you have access to, so that you don't have to depend on other recipes.

items.title: Professional Pearl and Bead Stringing

visible_instructors.name: Fleury
visible_instructors.job_title: Goldsmith, Gallery Owner, Gemologist, Professional Pearl and Bead Stringer
visible_instructors.title: Fleury Sommers

items.headline: Everything you need to know to create professionally made jewelry using pearl and bead stringing techniques.
objectives_summary: To acquire the skills necessary to string pearls and beads professionally.
In this course, you will learn the basic techniques used to string pearls and bead professionally, including complex finishing techniques.
You'll be provided with an extensive review of materials used in this jewelry making niche, including threads and appropriate selections.

items.title: 【English Subtitles】Animation tutorial for digital painting

visible_instructors.job_title: The First and The Largest Contents Trading Company in Japan
visible_instructors.title: JCCD Studio
visible_instructors.name: JCCD

items.headline: Using Adobe Photoshop CS5 and Clip Studio Paint to learn basic skills of drawing characters
objectives_summary: Learn how to draw the head and others parts of character
Design and draw your own character
Master the basic skills of digital painting

items.title: The Adventurers Guide to Drawing and Painting Dragons
items.headline: Everything you'll ever need to draw and paint amazing dragons.
objectives_summary: How to draw dragons
How to paint dragons
How to start from simple basic shapes

items.title: Canvas Workspace A to Z
items.headline: Create & Customize Cutting Files for your Brother ScanNCut
objectives_summary: You will be able to use the built-in shapes and fonts to design files.
You will be able to organize your files by working with layers.
You will be able to locate, download and import SVG files to use with Canvas Workspace.

items.title: Line and Wash - Combine Pen and Ink with Watercolor
items.headline: Drawing with ink and painting with watercolor.
objectives_summary: How to combine pen and ink with watercolor to create unique works of art
How to balance pen and ink with watercolor washes to take advantage of both mediums
Pen and ink techniques including how to create a variety of textures

items.title: Resin Geode Basics: How to create sparkling geode art works
items.headline: We build a simple resin geode together step by step, covering the basics of how to get started, materials and techniques
objectives_summary: You will understand the basic equipment needed
You will be able to make choices about your materials
You will be able to design your own geode art piece

items.title: Advanced Digital Comic Coloring Concepts & Techniques
items.headline: Take your coloring skills to the next level in this follow up to "A Pro's Guide." This is not a beginner course.
objectives_summary: Students will have a solid understanding of rendering different surfaces.
Student will understand how best to use blending modes and adjustment layers and masks.

items.title: Digital Painting - Amazing Fantasy Art in CLIP STUDIO PAINT
items.headline: A complete step by step guide to illustrating fantasy art elements and characters.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to draw and paint a variety of imaginative concepts.
You will be able to construct a complete character design from sketch to finish paint.
